amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for promotional or marketing materials promoting the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act or its benefits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 187 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 187 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Roberts.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 187 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 187 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Roberts.
